name: PHProjectAssetElement
desc: An element that represents a media asset within project section content.

items.name: var annotation: String
items.desc: A string annotation attached to the asset.

items.name: var cloudAssetIdentifier: PHCloudIdentifier
items.desc: The asset's identifier in the cloud.

items.name: var cropRect: CGRect
items.desc: A rectangle defining the cropped portion of the asset.

items.name: var regionsOfInterest: [PHProjectRegionOfInterest]
items.desc: An array of regions of interest in the photo asset.

items.name: var horizontallyFlipped: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the asset is vertically flipped.

items.name: var verticallyFlipped: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the asset is vertically flipped.
